description: Les Glaneuses is a zero-waste shop, grocery and drugstore, all in one, located in the 11th arrondissement of Paris. Established in December 2020, the shop offers high-quality, eco-responsible local products without packaging, encouraging customers to bring their own containers. Beyond selling goods, it serves as a community hub for exchange and learning, promoting sustainable living and healthy eating while fostering connections among local residents and producers. They also operate an online store, which allows customers to buy online.
name: Les Glaneuses
